text: For Your Eyes Only is a 1981 British spy action movie. It was directed by John Glen. It is the 12th movie in the James Bond franchise. It was based on the short story by Ian Fleming. The movie stars Roger Moore, Topol, Lynn-Holly Johnson, Julian Glover, Michael Gothard, Cassandra Harris, John Wyman, Desmond Llewelyn, Lois Maxwell, Charles Dance, Geoffrey Keen, and Jack Hedley. It was distributed by United Artists. It was nominated for an Academy Award in 1982. Sheena Easton sings the title song of the movie. The movie is rated PG because of some fighting scenes. There is a swimming pool scene where women are seen in bikinis showing off there hot sexy looks or having sex with men . ==Other websites== * * * Category:1980s spy movies Category:1981 action movies Category:James Bond movies Category:Movies set underwater Category:Movies set in Greece Category:Movies set in Italy Category:Movies set in Spain Category:Cold War movies Category:Roger Moore Category:Movies directed by John Glen
title: For Your Eyes Only (movie)
